column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////One of my favorite Chicago restaurants
column2: each visit is consistent and the quality top notch.  You definitely need reservations unless you are lucky enough to score the couch downstairs by the bar area
column3: but it's a bit difficult to eat while sitting on the couch.  I love that I can bring my favorite bottle and the corkage fee is waived as long as I share a glass with a fellow diner.
